view.name: system, basic, detailed, video, grid, gamecarousel

text.name: TextDescLong
text.text: The Amiga 1200, or A1200 (code-named "Channel Z"), is a personal computer in the Amiga computer family released by Commodore International, aimed at the home computer market. It was launched on October 21, 1992, at a base price of £399 in the United Kingdom (equivalent to £878 in 2021) and $599 in the United States (equivalent to $1,157 in 2021).

text.name: TextDescShort
text.text: The Amiga 1200, or A1200, is a personal computer in the Amiga computer family released by Commodore International.
